The ClientService class extends Service and is itself extended by all other service classes.

private IServiceManager oServiceManager
The IServiceManager instance used by this Service.

htSessions

private java.util.Hashtable htSessions
List of sessions that this service object services. key = the sessionId from the client, value = the session object that has details ( model name, userID )
